description.narrative:
Project Outcomes - Availability: This Project will increase the availability of 4G services across Argentina. The increase on the sponsor's 4G Coverage by 28.5% by 2020 suggests a Strong impact if small cities are targeted. Uptake: The Project has the potential to increase the mobile broadband penetration especially in remote/rural areas. More analysis will be conducted to measure the extent of the potential 4G uptake associated with this project. Quality, robustness and capacity: The Project expects to install roughly 4,000 sites providing 4G connectivity across the country by 2022, which represents an increase of 25% (More analysis on the location of these towers will be required).
Contribution to Market Creation: Competitiveness - The project can have an impact on competitiveness by introducing the latest technology (4G services) in areas previously unserved/underserved, which others will have to match to remain competitive. Integration - This Project has the potential to increase the online interactions between people, businesses, governments, machines, and processes - More analysis will be required to understand to what extent the size of the digital economy in Argentina will increase as a result of this project.

Telecom Argentina S.A. (Telecom or the Company) is a leading mobile, cable TV, fixed & wireless broadband and telephony services provider in Argentina. The Company also operates mobile, fixed & wireless broadband businesses in Paraguay and provides cable TV services in Uruguay. Telecom is listed in New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) and Buenos Aires Stock Exchange (BCBA) with a market capitalization of over US$7.0 billion (as of November 2018). The project aims to support the Companys 2019 capex plan, including the continued rollout of its 4G mobile network and further expansion of its fixed broadband services.
